where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* USEDIN(SELF, 'PRODUCT_VIEW_DEFINITION_ARM.PRODUCT_VIEW_DEFINITION.INITIAL_CONTEXT') | NOT ( 'PART_VIEW_DEFINITION_ARM.PART_VIEW_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (pvd) ) ) ) =0
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* USEDIN(SELF, 'PRODUCT_VIEW_DEFINITION_ARM.PRODUCT_VIEW_DEFINITION.ADDITIONAL_CONTEXTS') | NOT ( 'PART_VIEW_DEFINITION_ARM.PART_VIEW_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (pvd) ) ) ) =0
where.label: WR2

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'PART_VIEW_DEFINITION_ARM.PART_VIEW_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (pvd) ) ) AND ( 'PART_VIEW_DEFINITION_ARM.PART_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pvd.defined_version) ) ) ) =0
where.label: WR1
